name: Bonda (Potato Fritters)
description: Spiced potato balls in gram flour batter
instructions: Mix mashed potato with onions, chilies, ginger, curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add salt and shape into small balls
Make batter with gram flour, chili powder, asafoetida, salt
Add baking soda just before frying
description_sinhala: ග්‍රෑම් පිටි බැටරයේ කුළුබඩු සහිත අර්තාපල් බෝල
description_tamil: கிராம் மாவு மாவில் மசாலா உருளைக்கிழங்கு உருண்டைகள்
